attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am a genuine full time housewife and mother and i think that we should get paid for what we do,as we multi task and our jobs include cleaning,cooking,childminding and alot more rolled into one.we are on call 24/7,7 days a week,365 days of the year,we do not get the respect we deserve and get taken for granted,you would have to employ at least 3/4 people if not more to do the jobs we do so why cant we be paid,we deserve it.also we dont have time off for sickness and holidays,if you employed someone they wouldnt be there when they are ill or want a holiday.
